name: The Wolf Witch Hybrid
description:
Warning! This game is currently an Early Access Demo. Which may or may not be updated before the game is fully finished.

Welcome to The Wolf-Witch Hybrid, and RPG Maker MV game.

You play as a Wolf Hybrid Experiment who studies magic in her spare time, named Rebecca. She is on a quest to find out why all Witch activities have been banned without warning by Itra Kingdom. While, also, trying not to be recaptured by her creators.

Will she be able to fix the situation, or get to the bottom of it without getting captured by the Lab who made her?

~~~~~

Okay, so now that's out of the way let me explain my idea's/goals for the future of this game.

  • This game is being made with the intention to throw norms out of wack. (By that I mean the hardest difficulty is called 'Good Witch' whereas the easiest is 'Bad Witch'. )
  • There are only eight party members, which are all different fantasy types.
  • It's not planned to be very long but possibly could be.
  • This going to be used to test out Hidden Item Placement for future game reference.
  • Basically this is a social experiment on how well people like my game mechanics and techniques so I can apply them to other Games in the Future.
